title: Risen LOL is returning! Now looking for players (D4-Challenger)
body:
Hey guys, Risen is making it's return to LOL eSports!

It's been a long time coming since we were last involved in the LOL scene, with lots of new teams and player talents developing we believe it's now time to return and prove ourselves once again. Over the next few weeks we will be taking applications from all players D4 - Challenger who would be interested in joining the next evolution of Risen LOL.

As an organisation that has a long and storied history participating within Summoner's Society, TMG and the greater Oceanic LOL scene, we have a drive and commitment to ensure that we come back strong after our long departure from LOL eSports. We have high ambitions for this upcoming roster, with a desire to compete within a range of highly-contested tournaments with the Oceanic scene, our ultimate goal is to qualify for the OCAL and bring the Risen name back to the forefront. 

Applications for positions within the LOL team will close on the 15th of September, and from there on we will choose a handful of applicants to move on to the trials stage.

If you'd like to apply as a player, please refer to this link:
https://forms.gle/t5iqYJmwiMCDDHw16

If you'd like to apply as a manager, please refer to this link:
https://forms.gle/rQVN6aKZHbWgbtX78

Thankyou.
